translations.translation: woe that Day to the deniers,
Will be the day of woe for those
Woe, then, on that Day to those who give the lie (to this Message)
Woe will be to those who rejected the Truth
So on that day, ruin is for those who deny.
Then woe that Day to those who denied.
So woe on that day to those who reject (the truth),
woe that day unto those that cry lies,
Then woe that day unto the deniers
Woe on that Day to those who deny the truth,
Woe, then, will be on that Day to the beliers
woe to the deniers on that day
Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-
Then woe that Day to the beliers;
On that Day woe to those who belied
Woe on that Day to the deniers.
Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
[52:11] Woe then, terrible chastisement [will come], on that day to the deniers, of the messengers,
(Then woe) then severe chastisement (that day) which is the Day of Judgement (unto the deniers) of Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an; the reference here is to Abu Jahl and his host

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { فويلٌ يومئذ للمكذبين } الذين احتجبوا بالدنيا عن الآخرة فكذبوا بالجزاء { الذين } يخوضون في باطل الذات الحسيّة والاعتقادات الفاسدة والأقوال المزخرفة ويتعمقون في اللعب الذي هو الحياة الدنيا وزينتها السريعة الزوال

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَوَيْلٌ } عظيم وعذاب أليم { يَوْمَئِذٍ } واقع { لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ } [الطور: 11] المسرفين المصرين

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
